meanings.definition: A type of coral that forms branching, fan-shaped colonies.
meanings.sent1: The gorgonians swayed gently in the ocean currents.
meanings.sent2: Scientists study the gorgonians to learn more about coral reefs.
meanings.sent3: The gorgonians had a party and invited all the sea creatures.
meanings.sent4: The gorgonians stood tall like underwater skyscrapers.
meanings.sent5: The vibrant colors of the gorgonians lit up the ocean floor.

meanings.definition: Any of various marine animals of the order Gorgonacea, including sea fans and sea whips.
meanings.sent1: Divers marveled at the beauty of the gorgonians in the deep sea.
meanings.sent2: The gorgonians provided shelter for small fish in the ocean.
meanings.sent3: The mischievous octopus played hide-and-seek among the gorgonians.
meanings.sent4: The gorgonians danced gracefully with the rhythm of the waves.
meanings.sent5: The intricate patterns of the gorgonians resembled delicate lace.
